title: Freestyle and backstroke
brief_description: Part of the Competitive swimming series. Studies the underwater action of a team of Olympic swimmers. Demonstrates arm stroke technique, the twobeat kick and sixbeat flutter kick and breathing techniques. Excellent underwater photography. Variation between male and female swimmers.
